lead_paragraph: CUMMINGS--Bernice Nonette Lebow, on April 3, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Eugene. Devoted mother of Charles and Bob and motherin-law of Cynthia Hayes and Mary Brady. Cherished grandmother of David, Katharine, Alex and Michael. Also survived by her devoted companion, Laticha Heywood. Services Wednesday, 11:30am at "The Riverside," 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CUMMINGS, BERNICE NONETTE LEBOW
